__e: He has asked for four of the most seemly of your rank...to join the party.
I've given orders no harm is to come to you... no matter what happens.
The problem is the man who ordered your father killed. And in addition, killed my father...
A story needs to be told. We make it so it's not about us... who ordered what.
They come in here and waltz all over our shoes and now they don't wanna talk about it?
There's a head that ordered it, ...that wants you dead, too.
The King himself must have commanded this.
-If this was vampires, I'm pretty sure that I can guess who gave the order.
So if they ordered this hit, it would have been somebody they were comfortable with.
